trans-unit.source: Provides a graphics buffer for double buffering.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder en grafikk-buffer for dobbel bufring.

trans-unit.source: The BufferedGraphics class allows you to implement custom double buffering for your graphics.
trans-unit.target: Klassen BufferedGraphics lar deg til å implementere egendefinerte doble hurtigbufring for grafikk.

trans-unit.source: It provides a wrapper for a graphics buffer, along with methods that you can use to write to the buffer and render its contents to an output device.
trans-unit.target: Det gir en tekstbryting for en buffer for grafikk, og metoder som du kan bruke til å skrive til bufferen og gjengi innholdet til en output-enhet.

trans-unit.source: Graphics that use double buffering can reduce or eliminate flicker that is caused by redrawing a display surface.
trans-unit.target: Grafikk som bruker doble bufring kan redusere eller fjerne flimmer som forårsakes av oppdatering en visning overflate.

trans-unit.source: When you use double buffering, updated graphics are first drawn to a buffer in memory, and the contents of this buffer are then quickly written to some or all of the displayed surface.
trans-unit.target: Når du bruker doble bufring, oppdatert tegnes først en buffer i minnet, og innholdet i denne bufferen skrives deretter raskt til noen av eller alle viste overflaten.

trans-unit.source: This relatively brief overwrite of the displayed graphics typically reduces or eliminates the flicker that sometimes occurs when graphics are updated.
trans-unit.target: Denne relativt kort overskrive den viste grafikken vanligvis reduserer eller fjerner flimmer oppstår noen ganger når grafikk er oppdatert.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The simplest way to use double buffering is to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> control style flag on a control using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den enkleste måten å bruke doble bufring er å angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>Kontrollere stil flagg på en kontroll ved hjelp av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A>metode.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> flag for a control redirects all painting for the control through a default graphics buffer, without requiring any additional code.
trans-unit.target: Angivelse av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>flagget for en kontroll omadresserer alle malingen for kontrollen via en standard grafikk buffer uten at det kreves ekstra kode.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: This flag is set to `true` by default.
trans-unit.target: Dette flagget er satt til `true` som standard.

trans-unit.source: The BufferedGraphics class has no public constructor and must be created by the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> for an application domain using its <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Klassen BufferedGraphics har ingen offentlig konstruktør og må opprettes ved den <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>for et program domenet ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> for the current application domain from the static <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan hente den <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>for gjeldende programdomenet fra statiske <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics.Graphics%2A> property can be used for drawing to the graphics buffer.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics.Graphics%2A>kan brukes til tegning til grafikk-bufferen.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics.Graphics%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property provides access to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that draws to the graphics buffer allocated for this BufferedGraphics object.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen gir tilgang til den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objektet tegner til grafikk bufferen tildelt for dette objektet BufferedGraphics.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics.Render%2A> method with no arguments draws the contents of the graphics buffer to the surface specified when the buffer was allocated.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics.Render%2A>metode med noen argumenter tegner innholdet i grafikken buffer for overflaten angitt når bufferen som ble fordelt.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics.Render%2A>

trans-unit.source: Other overloads of the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics.Render%2A> method allow you to specify a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object or an <xref:System.IntPtr> object that points to a device context to which to draw the contents of the graphics buffer.
trans-unit.target: Andre overlastingene av den <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics.Render%2A>metoden, kan du angi en <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objekt eller en <xref:System.IntPtr>objektet som peker til en enhetskontekst som å tegne innholdet i grafikk-bufferen.</xref:System.IntPtr> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics.Render%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about drawing double-buffered graphics, see [Double Buffered Graphics](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om tegning av dobbel bufret grafikk [doble bufret grafikk](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Frigir alle ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> object.
trans-unit.target: Kall avhending når du er ferdig med den <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>objektet.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> object in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Fjerningsmetoden forlater den <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>objekt i en ubrukelig tilstand.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> object so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> object was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Etter å avhending, må du frigi alle referanser til den <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>objekt slik saneringsoppsamlingen kan gjenvinne minnet som den <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>objektet ble bruker.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [Rydder opp uforvaltede ressurser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [implementere metoden fjerne](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> object.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Alltid kall avhending før du slipper siste referanse til det <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>objektet.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Ellers ressurser den bruker vil ikke bli frigjort før saneringsoppsamling kall av <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>objektets `Finalize` metode.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>

trans-unit.source: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Gjør det mulig for et objekt å prøve å frigjøre ressurser og utføre andre operasjoner for opprydding før den er gode av datasanering.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object that outputs to the graphics buffer.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> objektet utdata graphics-bufferen.

trans-unit.source: This property provides a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that draws to the graphics buffer allocated for this <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> object.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen gir en <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objektet tegner til grafikk bufferen som er tildelt til dette <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>objektet.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object that outputs to the graphics buffer.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> objektet utdata graphics-bufferen.

trans-unit.source: Writes the contents of the graphics buffer to the default device.
trans-unit.target: Skriver innholdet i bufferen grafikk standardenheten.

trans-unit.source: This method writes the contents of the graphics buffer to the device specified by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A> method of the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> used to create this <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> object.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden skriver innholdet i grafikk bufferen for enhet som er angitt ved å kalle den <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A>metoden for den <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>brukes til å opprette dette <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>objektet.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Writes the contents of the graphics buffer to the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Skriver innholdet i bufferen grafikk til den angitte <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: This method writes the contents of the graphics buffer to the specified <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden skriver innholdet i bufferen grafikk til den angitte <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objektet.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object to which to write the contents of the graphics buffer.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> objekt for å skrive til innholdet i grafikk-bufferen.

trans-unit.source: Writes the contents of the graphics buffer to the device context associated with the specified <xref:System.IntPtr> handle.
trans-unit.target: Skriver innholdet i bufferen grafikk enheten kontekst som er knyttet til den angitte <xref:System.IntPtr>håndtere.</xref:System.IntPtr>

trans-unit.source: This method writes the contents of the graphics buffer to the device context associated with the specified <xref:System.IntPtr> handle.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden skriver innholdet i bufferen grafikk enheten kontekst som er knyttet til den angitte <xref:System.IntPtr>håndtere.</xref:System.IntPtr>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IntPtr> that points to the device context to which to write the contents of the graphics buffer.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.IntPtr>som peker på enhetskonteksten for å skrive til innholdet i grafikk-bufferen.</xref:System.IntPtr>
